title: INSIDE ISAAC ASIMOV: QUOTES & CONTEMPLATIONS
description: In honor of Isaac Asimov (He was way ahead of his time): Asimov published more than 500 books (Foundation Series, I. Robot, ...) during his lifetime. He is best known as one of the grandmasters of science fiction. He also wrote textbooks and scientific studies that inspired many scientists and AI Researcher. As a member of Mensa International, his genius was recognized worldwide."The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom." ~ Isaac AsimovBe inspired
author: Murat Durmus
